turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a cafe latte from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like almond milk, and I want it to be a small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a small caffe latte with almond milk to be picked up at the peet's coffee on 853 broadway, new york city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you. No, that's all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
